text: Hanki ana mono no eri'zama kvama hu'naza Livae vahera, Jeshua'ene ne' mofavre naga'ane afu'aganahe'zane, Kadmieli'ene ne' mofavre naga'ane Juda ne' mofavre naga'ene, Ra Anumzamofo mono nomofonte eri'zana kva hu'nage'za eri'naze. Ana nehazage'za Henadadi ne' mofavre naga'ene zamafuhe'za Livae naga'mo'zane zamaza hu'za ana eri'zana kegava hu'naze.
